name: Walking Plague USA: Free GS Bow and Arrow Shooting Game for the Dead
name_original: Walking Plague USA: Free GS Bow and Arrow Shooting Game for the Dead
description:
-- THE HUMANKIND DEPENDS ON YOUR HELP!! --

-- YOUR TWO FAVORITES TOGETHER IN A SINGLE GAME - APPLE AND ZOMBIES !! --

It is a little known fact, please, keep it secret!

But when you place a fruit on top of zombies head, and you manage to shoot that fruit the zombie once again becomes human!

For that we placed an apple on a zombies head and your task is to shoot that apple!

If a person has been a living dead for more than 2 full moons it takes more than a couple of shots to cure him!

May luck be on your side! And happy hunting! ;)


In this game:

- Fun and crazy shooting

- Cool effects

- Game Center
